Description: a

Name: Meet and Greet
Description: End your Turn on a Player

Name: Learning the Ropes
Description: Use 8 items

Name: Architect
Description: Create/Place 3 Buildings

Name: Multitasker
Description: Use an Item, Hazard, and Building in 1 Turn

Name: Nasty Preparations
Description: Create/Place 5 Hazards

Name: Ramp in Power
Description: Use a T1, T2, T3 item within a single Turn.

Name: Not enough Explosions
Description: Create 3 Grenade-like Temporary Creation items (using a Mortar counts).

Name: Power of Luck
Description: Use 1 "Constant" and 1 "Reroll" on the same Turn. (Does NOT include Move Dice Reroll)

Name: Treasure Hunter
Description: Open 3 Chests.

Name: Improvised Gunslinger
Description: Use 3 Unique Line of Sight Items in 1 Turn

Name: Bounty Hunting
Description: Steal 15 Gold from a Target in 1 Turn

Name: Speedrunner
Description: Move 20 Spaces across the Board in 1 Turn

Name: King of the Tile
Description: End your turn on Space X

Name: Beat and Greet
Description: Steal something from a Player and End your Turn on the same Space as them.

Name: Fail Compilation
Description: Trigger 3 Hazards at the Start of your Turn.

Name: Run it Back
Description: Start 3 Turns on the same Row.

Name: Darkness is Beautiful
Description: Start a Turn with every Player in the Spatial Hallway.

Name: Shoot for the Stars
Description: Roll a 20 or higher for any Dice Result (can be achieved using Constants and Rerolls).

Name: He Strikes Again
Description: Pass the same Player 4 times within a single Turn.

Name: Curse Collector
Description: Hold 4 Unique Curses at the same time.

Name: Adjective Overload
Description: Use an Item (not any other item type) containing 5 or more Unique Item Modifiers.

Name: Second Life
Description: Reach the End Twice in 1 Turn

Name: Rush to Riches
Description: Gain 40 Gold in 1 Turn.
